external_references.description: Mandiant. (n.d.). APT1 Exposing One of China’s Cyber Espionage Units. Retrieved July 18, 2016.

objects.description: [APT1](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0006) compromised a vast set of 3rd party victim hop points as part of their network infrastructure. For example, [APT1](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0006) hijacked FQDNs associated with legitimate websites hosted by hop points. Mandiant considers them to be “hijacked” since they were originally registered for a legitimate reason but were used by APT1 for malicious purposes.(Citation: Mandiant APT1)
